entry.tran: 招魂论，通灵术(相信死人的灵魂能与活人相沟通)
entry.def: Spiritualism is the belief that the spirits of people who are dead can communicate with people who are still alive.

means.word_mean: 1. (theology) any doctrine that asserts the separate existence of God
2. the belief that the spirits of dead people can communicate with people who are still alive (especially via a medium)
3. concern with things of the spirit
